title: Virtual Reality (VR) Integrated Design Workshop for Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Course for General Citizens to Learn Designing Medical Education Content with VR Technology and Applying It to Community Health Promotion Projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core elements of VR educational scenarios using evidence-based materials derived from the Delphi technique.
Learners can integrate cognitive, affective, and psychomotor learning objectives when developing medical VR content using the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach.
Learners can design standard operating procedures (SOPs) considering the reusability of VR resources in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
